short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of bookmarks, use tagging for advanced capability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tagging allows you to quickly and easily research multiple things without the need to create folders.

o Tags are automatically saved to your profile
o Tags will automatically sync to any logged in browser
o Search by recently changed bookmarks or most researched
o Bookmark visualization graph
